Title: Episode #1.2
Director: Sacha Baron Cohen, Nathan Fielder, Daniel Gray Longino, Dan Mazer
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Aaron Geary, Anthony Hines, Lee Kern, Adam Lowitt, Dan Mazer, Kurt Metzger, Eric Notarnicola, Brian Reich, Dan Swimer
Actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Dick Cheney, Ted Koppel, Emanuela Postacchini
Plot: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation.
